::Cyndro::

The second blast hit the shields, and Cyndro fires back with a few more missiles. Three of them hit Weapon's boulder, the other three hitting around it.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Weapon::
> 
> Weapon saw some missiles flying back at him, just as he expected.
> 
> "Yeehaw!" Weapon said in glee.
> 
> The missiles came at him.  Weapon dodged one of them, and.....He purposely
> dived right into the other one.  It smoked him, and he was sent flying
> through the air into a tree.
> 
> "Great fun!!!  Aw yeah!" he yelled like an insane person.
> 
> Weapon got up with ease, then, went over by a builder, and ducked behind it.
> He popped up, then fired another shot from the fusion cannon at Maximal
> City, and sat back down behind the boulder so they couldn't see him.  But
> that didn't mean the missiles couldn't still detect him and stuff...
